1112.title: Readers choice

11131.content:
Being a police officer in New York was hard. Dangerous criminals and long hours, leaving little time for private life, like going out to eat or on dates. Aya Brea finally found the time to go on a date with a charming man to the opera. Having worked herself to the bone, a night at the opera would be a splendid activity. Dressing herself in a gorgeous dress, Aya gleefully strode into the theater, amused by the glances of admiring men. She was rather slender, her demanding job kept her body well maintained.

"Oh no they've already started!" Aya could hear distant singing and rushed to her seat.

Aya sat her firm butt in a seat along side her date and watched the performance. It was a typical opera, people sang and acted out scenes of love and tragedy, what one would expect. It wasn't until the woman, an actress named Melissa Pearce, began singing that things got weird. Her vocals left Aya in a bit of a daze. Ditzy, Aya focused on the singer noticing how Melissa was beautifully adorn in a fabulous dress that tightly wrapped her thin figure.

Suddenly people began bursting into flames. Experienced from years of being a police officer, Aya kept her cool and observed how Melissa was unfazed and continued singing. Every man combusted along with most women.

"Ahh what's going on?!" screamed a portly woman unharmed.

"Get out of here!" Aya ordered.

The portly woman rushed out of there along with several other hefty ladies. A trait that Aya tactically noted. With no one left Aya approached Melissa with gun drawn.

"Freeze!" Aya commanded.

"Oh you seem to be fine. You must be awakening." Melissa mysterious said.

"What are you saying?" Aya nervously asked.

"Listen, your fat cells are calling out. They're trying to communicate." Melissa spoke in a seemingly soothing manner.

"My fat cells?!" insulted, Aya than fired upon the actress.

Melissa laughed as Aya's bullet proved futile. Suddenly Aya's dress felt tight.

"What's happening...? My body!...It's..It's getting hot!!" Aya cried out

"Just as I thought." Melissa smirked.

"What are you doing to me!?" flying bullets accompanied Aya's shrieks.

"Our bodies are communicating with each other. Can't you feel it?" Melissa teased. "Use it. Use your power. You will become like me."

"Like you?" Aya replied.

"Eve."

"..."

"My name is Eve. You should know me well Aya..." informed the actress.

An image flashed before Aya of a chubby girl lying in a laboratory.

"What's going on?!" Aya demanded.

However Eve disregarded her orders and ran off. Aya chased after her. The short distance was harder than usual for the officer. She was sweating and out of breathe. Her dress was feeling really tight. So tight that a tear split along her side. Aya pressed on and reached a massive hole in the ground..

"She's down there."

Aya knew she had to follow Eve but a crippling hunger struck her. She decided whether she should immediately pursue or wait for backup to come perhaps with food.
11131.title: Night at the Opera

info.brief_description: The Mitochondria have decided to make weight gainers out of the human females of the world
info.description:
Even though I have often looked
I have yet to see a weight gain interactive directly dedicated to the horror videogame series franchise Parasite Eve

the three known to me games in the series
"Parasite Eve"
"Parasite Eve II"
"Parasite Eve The 3rd Birthday" unfortunately i yet to complete

This is just a fan fiction interactive based on chubby to unconditional immobile fantasies

rule one
no nudity or suggestive behavior for the children, unless you aged them to young adult versions of themselves however don't take it beyond that

for the adults complete nudity with suggestive behavior is accepted however don't take it beyond that

rule two
health beauty strength to move is to increase not decrease

Rule three
there is to be no turning into a shapeless blob of fat, no death. no pregnancy, no other version of expansion. outside of weight gain.

I hope you are able to Enjoy
